subject: fix(lint): move setState out of useEffect in DebugBanner
body:
The react-hooks/set-state-in-effect rule (eslint-plugin-react-hooks v7)
flagged runDiagnostics() being called inside useEffect because it calls
setDiagnostics (setState) synchronously within the effect body.

Moved the diagnostics trigger from the useEffect into the expand button's
onClick handler, which is the only call site for setExpanded(true). This
preserves the same behavior (diagnostics run on first expand) while
satisfying the lint rule.
